metadata.title: CVE-2015-2297 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: nanohttp in libcsoap allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a craftedAuthorization header.

criterions.comment: libcsoap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
